::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tmap,           # Creates thematic maps for visualisation
               SpatialAcc,     # Calculates spatial accessibility metrics
               sf,             # Manages and analyses spatial data
               ggstatsplot,    # Enhances plots with statistical details
               reshape2,       # Reshapes data between wide/long formats
               tidyverse       # Data manipulation and visualisation toolkit
               )
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_read(dsn = "C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex09/data/geospatial",
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL' from data source 
  `C:\zzzzzuu\ISSS626GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex09\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagons <- st_read(dsn = "C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex09/data/geospatial", layer = "hexagons") 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `hexagons' from data source 
  `C:\zzzzzuu\ISSS626GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex09\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 3125 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: POLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 21506.33 xmax: 50010.26 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21 / Singapore TM
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
eldercare <- st_read(dsn = "C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex09/data/geospatial", layer = "ELDERCARE")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Reading layer `ELDERCARE' from data source 
  `C:\zzzzzuu\ISSS626GAA\Hands-on_Ex\Hands-on_Ex09\data\geospatial' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 120 features and 19 fields
Geometry type: POINT
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 14481.92 ymin: 28218.43 xmax: 41665.14 ymax: 46804.9
Projected CRS: SVY21 / Singapore TM
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz <- st_transform(mpsz, 3414)
eldercare <- st_transform(eldercare, 3414)
hexagons <- st_transform(hexagons, 3414)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
eldercare <- eldercare %>%
  select(fid, ADDRESSPOS) %>% #only select the ID, and address coz the rest are useless)
  mutate(capacity = 100)
hexagons <- hexagons %>%
  select(fid) %>%
  mutate(demand = 100)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ODMatrix <- read_csv("C:/zzzzzuu/ISSS626GAA/Hands-on_Ex/Hands-on_Ex09/data/aspatial/OD_Matrix.csv", skip = 0)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Rows: 375000 Columns: 6
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
dbl (6): origin_id, destination_id, entry_cost, network_cost, exit_cost, tot...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
distmat <- ODMatrix %>%
  select(origin_id, destination_id, total_cost) %>%
  spread(destination_id, total_cost)%>% #spread converts it into matrix
  select(c(-c('origin_id')))
distmat_km <- as.matrix(distmat/1000)

#120 variables is each of the elderlycare
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand, #origin
                            eldercare$capacity, #destination
                            distmat_km, 
                            #d0 = 50, #distance limit, 50km
                            power = 2, 
                            family = "Hansen"))
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"
acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: `tbl_df()` was deprecated in dplyr 1.0.0.
ℹ Please use `tibble::as_tibble()` instead.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
acc_Hansen <- data.frame(ac(hexagons$demand,
                            eldercare$capacity,
                            distmat_km, 
                            #d0 = 50,
                            power = 0.5, 
                            family = "Hansen"))

colnames(acc_Hansen) <- "accHansen"
acc_Hansen <- tbl_df(acc_Hansen)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
Warning: `tbl_df()` was deprecated in dplyr 1.0.0.
ℹ Please use `tibble::as_tibble()` instead.
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- bind_cols(hexagons, acc_Hansen)
mapex <- st_bbox(hexagons)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
tmap_mode("plot")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
tmap mode set to plotting
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
tm_shape(hexagon_Hansen,
         bbox = mapex) + 
  tm_fill(col = "accHansen",
          n = 10,
          style = "quantile",
          border.col = "black",
          border.lwd = 1) +
tm_shape(eldercare) +
  tm_symbols(size = 0.1) +
  tm_layout(main.title = "Accessibility to eldercare: Hansen method",
            main.title.position = "center",
            main.title.size = 2,
            legend.outside = FALSE,
            legend.height = 0.45, 
            legend.width = 3.0,
            legend.format = list(digits = 6),
            legend.position = c("right", "top"),
            frame = TRUE) +
  tm_compass(type="8star", size = 2) +
  tm_scale_bar(width = 0.15) +
  tm_grid(lwd = 0.1, alpha = 0.5)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-8-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
hexagon_Hansen <- st_join(hexagon_Hansen, mpsz, 
                          join = st_intersects)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggbetweenstats(
  data = hexagon_Hansen,
  x = REGION_N,
  y = accHansen,
  type = "p",
  title = "Boxplot with Means by Region"
)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex09_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
